lead_paragraph: ROSENMAN--Robert. The lawyers and staff of Cravath, Swaine & Moore LLP mourn the passing of their partner, colleague and friend, Robert Rosenman. We extend our deepest sympathies to his wife and family. Mr. Rosenman joined Cravath in 1956, became a partner in 1965 and retired in 2001. He served as Of Counsel to the Firm from 2002 to 2008. Mr. Rosenman's practice focused on securities and general corporate law, and his many clients included AVX Corporation; IBM; L.F. Rothschild, Unterberg, Towbin; and LIN Broadcasting. He became an Adjunct Professor at the New York University School of Law in 1986, where he taught securities law. He was not only a successful practitioner, but also a mentor to multiple generations of Cravath attorneys who benefitted immensely from his intellect and guidance. 1/3
